alert.note: Alert for Central Chelan County; Western Chelan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 6:18AM PST until January 19 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 3 PM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations between 5 and 9 inches and ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Holden Village, Stehekin, Plain, Stevens Pass, and Leavenworth. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 3 PM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday evening and Friday morning commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation will start as snow Thursday mixing with freezing rain near Stevens Pass Friday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest travel information in Washington, go to https://wsdot.wa.gov/travel

area.areaDesc: Central Chelan County; Western Chelan County
